Welcome to the lecture sources for the *Quantitative Text Analysis: Unveiling the Power of Words*. 
The course is a transformative course that immerses graduate students in the world of Computational Social Science. 
It provides a comprehensive understanding of text extraction, processing, and analysis techniques, including text scraping, preprocessing, structuralization, keyword analysis, and topic modeling. 
See more information in the [course webpage](https://sammo3182.github.io).
